e20-3yp-FlickNest.title: FlickNest
e20-3yp-FlickNest.description: FlickNest is an innovative smart automation system that allows you to control your electronic devices effortlessly through hand gestures. Powered by the advanced FlickNest Smart Bracelet, it transforms your gestures into seamless commands, enabling intuitive and hands-free management of your home environment.

e20-3yp-SkyT.title: SkyT
e20-3yp-SkyT.description: Drone based smart crop management system

e20-3yp-Smart-IOT-Indoor-Lighting-System.title: Smart IOT Indoor Lighting System
e20-3yp-Smart-IOT-Indoor-Lighting-System.description: This Smart IoT Lighting System is designed for indoor lighting, integrating hardware with cloud connectivity for seamless control. Users can conveniently configure preferences and manage settings via a secure mobile app with voice command support, ensuring personalized and efficient lighting experiences, ease of use, and robust data security.

e20-3yp-VR-Multiplayer-Golf-Game.title: VR Multiplayer Golf Game
e20-3yp-VR-Multiplayer-Golf-Game.description: VR-Multiplayer-Golf-Game allows multiple users to play golf in VR environment. The game features a virtual environment which allows a user to have an immersive experience.
